original: 潁川長社人，王渾之妻。先祖乃曹魏名臣鍾繇。聰慧弘雅，博覽記籍，外貌舉止俱佳，善詩文，有作品文集傳世。另有軼事稱其有相人之能。
text: Member of Yingchuan Changshe, wife of Wang Hun. The ancestor was Zhong Yao, the famous minister of Cao Wei. Smart and elegant, well-read, good appearance and demeanor, good poetry, and a collection of works handed down to the world. Another anecdote said that he has the ability to be like people.
